channel.title: Help with shield plz
channel.description:
So heres what happened i made a Dragon Kiteshield and it doesnt stay in the place wen the camera moves
It goes through the player. The one on the right is ok but on the left it isnt
[IMG]http://i530.photobucket.com/albums/dd346/bonearmyproductions/HELP.jpg[/img]
The bottom ones are the model.
Hiw do i fix it?

item.title: Help with shield plz
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:
@BoneArmyProductions wrote:

ty id rep ++ u if i could

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shield plz
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

you have to set the priority level to 10 in datmaker, after that re load your model and it should be fine.
The priority level is located in the bottom left hand corner in datmaker.

Read full topic
